about.title: About us
about.text_1: Tin Defi was born with the goal of becoming the decentralized social network par excellence. Able to unify the crypto world in an efficient, fun and practical way.
about.text_2: From the very beginning, we have been working with the objective of offering the crypto sector a space reserved for all its stakeholders and investors.  Another of the main motivations is to encourage the maximum possible adoption. And to encourage innovation, freedom, anonymity among many other features of the blockchain within the application.
about.text_3: The team working behind the company contains the strength, innovation and creativity of the youngest. Combined with the experience, contacts and maturity of the older ones. This fact allows Tin Defi to have a solid and flexible balance point. In addition, it has the advantage of having worked as a team previously, and the extra of having acquired the know-how of the sector. This allows him to easily know each and every one of the existing needs of projects, investors, influencers and Venture capitals.
about.text_4: As if that were not enough, small doses of enormous value are added by the advisors. Successful professionals strategically selected to provide the greatest possible value, who together with their networks and knowledge will be of great help to further enhance the success of the company and its investors.
about.text_5: Finally, it is worth noting the wide variety of cultures within the team. This fact allows us to obtain broader points of view when making strategic decisions. If anything can represent the Tin Defi team, it is the commitment to the community, and especially to those investors who decide to trust and bet on this great venture.

content.title: Content
content.html: Our revenue generation system will reward you for sharing posts on Vibes, streaming on Lives and uploading topical news stories.

views.title: Views
views.html: Depending on the interaction and the amount of views your content receives, your profile will be framed within a degree of viralisation. Thanks to our system you will be able to generate monthly income according to your degree of viralization.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.html: Premium users with a minimum number of followers will have the ability to launch different monthly paid subscriptions to their followers who will only be able to access this content by purchasing this subscription.

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.html: Our system allows Projects, Influencers and Venture Capitals to collaborate with each other. All of them will be able to make deals with each other that will allow them to scale their exposure to the public quickly.

defi.title: Decentralization
defi.html: This intermediation system is fully governed by Smart Contracts, so that both parties are guaranteed that the agreement will be fulfilled. Both parties must be satisfied for the other to receive what has been agreed.

security.title: Security
security.html: In case of dissatisfaction with the outcome of the agreement, the Tin DeFi team can be called upon to act as a judge to determine whether the terms of the agreement have been fully complied with.

step2.title: Connect your wallet to create your Tin DeFi account
step2.text: Your crypto wallet securely stores your digital goods and cryptocurrencies. Connect to one of our wallet providers or create a new one.

step3.title: How do we start?
step3.text: Let's start with something simple, the name will show up when other users look at your profile.
step3.label: What do you want to call you?

step4.title: Very good, {name}
step4.text: Remember that you can always edit it later.
step4.label: How should people call you?

step5.title: How would you describe yourself?
step5.text: Detail how you would like to be percibed. Remember to make yourself stand out.

step6.title: Upload your profile picture or choose a random avatar
step6.text: The avatars and visual elements are property of © Tin DeFi. Learn more

step7.title: We're almost done. Choose a header
step7.text: Show the world your style. People who visit your profile will see it in that way

step8.title: Congratulations your account has been created successfully
step8.text: Detail how you would to be percibed. Remember to make yourself stand out.

item_1.title: Abundance
item_1.text: Tin Defi collects in a single application, all the valuable tools that the blockchain user needs, and saves time every day.

item_2.title: Anonymity
item_2.text: The application allows users' personal data to be protected, maintaining an anonymous and secure environment at all times.

item_3.title: Transparency
item_3.text: The dissemination of cryptographic content is allowed in a free and unrestricted manner. Being a social network with no strings attached

item_4.title: Advance
item_4.text: High-value on-chain tools are provided, which fight for and support innovation at all times.

item_5.title: Security
item_5.text: Tin Defi is supported by SCAN DeFi, in charge of ensuring the security of each and every user within the blockchain.

item_6.title: Scalability
item_6.text: Tin Defi's goal is to become the only crypto social network capable of bringing together all existing parties within the application.

item_7.title: Interoperability
item_7.text: Marketing systems are developed by experts to enable interoperability between networks.

item_8.title: Trust
item_8.text: Influencers and projects have a system of smart contracts that allows them to make agreements with trust, thanks to the support of Tin Defi as an intermediary.

item_9.title: Simplicity
item_9.text: The design and development experts have “Make it easy” as their motto and deliver an optimal user interface

item_10.title: Proximity
item_10.text: Supporting blockchain and proximity is possible, Tin Defi team will be available 24h for the user.

item_11.title: Adoption
item_11.text: The application will be available to any user, allowing access to all users, whether or not they have a digital wallet.

item_12.title: Tranquility
item_12.text: Legalized company backing up the application at all times

item_1.title: Tracking list
item_1.text:
The watch list allows investors to receive instant information on events of their choice. For example:

If I know that in a project called SCAN, there are 2 wallets that have privileged information, great market exposure, are owners...etc. I want to be notified when they make a transaction, whether it is a purchase, sale or transfer.

item_2.title: Anti honeypot tool
item_2.text: This tool detects if the owners of the contract can restrict at any time the sale or purchase, otherwise ... It will be a sign of reliability for the investor.

item_3.title: Reliability percentage
item_3.text: Once as many variables as possible have been studied for each of the tokens, a reliability percentage is provided, which guides the user about the risks involved in investing in each specific asset.

item_4.title: Correlation analysis with social networks
item_4.text: Within this tool, it will be possible to analyze the correlations in the price when making public announcements by the project. This will bring us closer to knowing which wallets have privileged information and, therefore, a greater probability of winning over the rest of the investors.

item_5.title: Superficial analysis of contract tokenomics
item_5.text: Commissions, liquidity, ownership waiver, supply distribution, dangerous wallets for receiving unique or sustainable rewards over time... these are some of the points covered in this section.

item_6.title: Contract efficiency analysis
item_6.text: Thanks to knowing the standards of blockchain professionalism, within the efficiency analysis, a study is carried out that allows to know the degree of profession behind the creators of the token contract. In order to know replicas, failures and strange imperfections for a professional in the development area. This implies having a list of aspects in favor and others against.

item_7.title: Internal analysis of holders
item_7.text: In addition, SCAN DeFi offers an internal breakdown of the investors that belong to each token. And in that way to know if there is any correlation with wallets that have already been reported for different factors in particular, which allows to have a broader view on each asset.

item_8.title: Analysis of sinister functions
item_8.text: To finish with the examples, comes the analysis of the sinister functions within each token. Increasing or reducing holders' supply, burning or mining total supply, increasing or reducing such, transferring holders' tokens at any time, accessing wallets in any way... are some of the examples of sinister functions offered to investors.

item_9.title: Wallets
item_9.text:
In this section, the community has a section to share through reports, experiences, opinions or criticisms about the projects. In this way, a supportive community that works uniformly for a common goal is encouraged. Keeping the cryptocurrency sector safe, and facilitating its adoption, avoiding other users to fall into scams and unreliable projects.

In addition, alternatives are provided so that projects that have been reported without deserving it, can be removed from this list, and show in a transparent way with our community, that they are valuable projects.

item_10.title: Tokens
item_10.text: On the other hand, wallet reports. Once we find a user who has participated in fraud, we have the opportunity to report him and prevent other users from carrying out any kind of direct link with him. In this way, we ensure that the authorities can intervene the wallets of people who have committed an illicit act.

item_11.title: SCAN DEX
item_11.text:
A decentralized Exchange that connects the smart contracts of each project with the scanner, and thus. It allows the commercialization of only those assets that are safe for the community.

It will also offer the possibility of establishing order books, farming services, staking, and visualization of graphs and transactions, among other functionalities.

item_12.title: SCAN CHECK
item_12.text: Within SCAN CHECK, there will be a simple interface with information of high value for the investor. It allows you to know at all times the market situation, checking with a couple of clicks.

item_13.title: Transaction analysis
item_13.text:
First of all, the investor will be able to know the number of purchases, sales and transfers within each token. He can also filter by wallet to know this information separately.

Secondly, the number of daily purchases and sales can be viewed in parallel, separately, together with their volume.

In addition, a time chart will be displayed in which we can observe the hours of most interaction with the market for each token over time.

Finally, the investor will know the amount of tokens entering and exiting exchanges on a time chart.

item_14.title: Value analysis
item_14.text:
In the first graph we will show the average number of holders who are in profit, versus those who are in loss. It will also be possible to filter, in order to know the current result of a specific wallet within a token.

On the other hand, it shows a ranking with the wallets with more % of profit and loss, in which the amount of its result is also provided. With the possibility of following the wallet, to be informed of each transaction it may make.

Pen aggregate, the operations of the holders appear, and a ranking of successes and failures is made. Counting as a hit, those occasions in which an investor bought and sold the same amount with profit. In this way, investors will be offered the possibility of following a wallet that has a long history of successes within a token.

Finally, a ranking of wallets with the highest investment in USDT within the currency, together with their profit margin and number of purchases.

item_15.title: Tokenomics Analysis
item_15.text: During this section, information is stored on the history of burns, mints, commissions ups and downs, and number of tokens in contracts. Together with their equivalent in terms of the project's liquidity.

item_16.title: Audits
item_16.text:
One of the most valuable implementations for Tin Defi is the possibility to show users those projects that have passed the SCAN DeFi audits, and therefore guarantee security for their users in terms of smarts contracts.

With this differentiation, the aim is to reduce the rate of fraud in the blockchain, and thus make the sector as secure as possible in the long term. So that more and more users adopt cryptocurrencies as a payment system in their daily lives.

item_6.title: Being optimistic
item_6.text: This allows us to face all unforeseen events with open arms, with energy to receive new learning.

item_1.title: Usability and common sense
item_1.text: Our token offers a multitude of options for its holders, which will be expanded in the future. Always knowing the importance of supporting its adoption with real facts.

item_2.title: Demonstrable experience
item_2.text: Our team has been working on SCAN DEFI for many months, which has provided us with unique know-how, contacts, vision and problem solving.

item_3.title: Deflationary token
item_3.text: $TIN is subject to a 50% reduction of its offer, offering the maximum possible support to investors.

item_4.title: Unique business model
item_4.text: It is not sufficient to allocate 50% of the supply for burning. Tin Defi will make periodic purchases of TIN, again destined for burning. In addition, many of its revenue sources will be counted as burns, not company revenues.

item_5.title: Legality assured
item_5.text: We are concerned about the safety and confidence of our users, that is why we submit to the regulations of El Salvador, which provide an incomparable freedom with the rest of the countries.
